welcome.subject: Spot in - Welcome to Spot in
welcome.message: Thank you for signing up to Spot in. Please set your password by clicking the link below. You will be able to use Spot in once you set your password.
welcome.linkText: Set my password and start using Spot in
welcome.didNotRequestNewAccount: If you did not sign up to Spot in, please ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Spot in - Reset your password
passwordReset.message: You have requested to reset your password. Please click the link below to set a new password.
passwordReset.didNotRequestNewAccount: If you did not request to reset your password, please ignore this email.

recoverAccount.subject: Spot in - Recover your account
recoverAccount.paragraphOne: You have requested to create a new account on Spot in. However, a previous account under the username {username} already exists with your email address.
recoverAccount.paragraphTwo: Please click the link below to recover your account. You will be able to update your account details (such as your username) once you set your password.
recoverAccount.didNotRequestNewAccount: If you did not request to create an account on Spot in, please reply to this email to let us know. We will take care of the rest.
